title: I had a pixel 2 stolen and phone was cut off while I was away for a year. Added device on plan has s
content: See if Pixel 2 device on family plan is my stolen phone? I don't know the number. It is exact same size and color as mine. An ex girlfriend picked it up when I was arrested. Year later I get home and it's not there. Then I see devices on plan that don't recognize and one us Pixel 2 same size gb/color? I want to see if it can be found by imei or just something to know if I can get a replacement.
